page.title: 10Agriculture,Earlston
page.content: { Arable,sheep and beef}are the three main types of agriculture.Farming is easier now and a better business because farmers have more machinery. In{arable}farming, a large area is grass.Some is used for hay and silage. Silage is used for feeding cattle and is stored in a pit.There are some new crops being grown such as oil seed rape and peas.Oats are not so popular but in the olden days they were very popular.Turnips are grown as fodder for sheep. { Sheep}farming is popular because of the type of land.Lambing is normally in Spring-the lambs being sold at Newtown St Boswells. { Beef}cattle are fattened on hay and barley before they go to the market where they are sold to the butcher who takes them to be slaughtered.
